session_summary: At 8:16 pm on 25 October 2022, Nate asked Joanna how she's been. Joanna shared her excitement about having her script shown on the big screen for the first time, expressing a mix of emotions and satisfaction. Nate congratulated her and Joanna described the surreal experience of seeing her work come to life. The two discussed characters, with Joanna explaining her inspiration and Nate praising her drawings. They also talked about Nate's turtles and their varied diet. Joanna found it fascinating and admired how Nate's turtles have different personalities. The conversation ended with Nate expressing his love for turtles and Joanna looking forward to hearing more about them in the future.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Hey Joanna, what's been up since we last chatted? How's it going?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a box of cards with a quote on it
conversation_turns.text: Hey Nate! Another movie script that I contributed to was shown on the big screen last Sunday for the first time! It was such a surreal experience to see everything come together. I felt a mix of emotions, but overall, it was a satisfying moment. I've been waiting for this for a long time!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a box with a controller inside of it
conversation_turns.text:
Congrats Joanna! How was it to finally see it on the big screen?

[shares a photo holding a videogame controller]

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: It was an amazing experience! I'll never forget seeing all of the characters and dialogue I wrote being acted out - it was such a cool feeling. Having all the hard work and determination I put into writing pay off was definitely rewarding. I know this is the third time it's happened, but its just so awesome!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: That must have been amazing. What was your favorite part of it?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a drawing book with a bunch of drawings on it
conversation_turns.text: Seeing my characters I worked so hard on come alive was my favorite part. It felt like they jumped off the page and became real - it was totally surreal.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Wow Joanna, those drawings are really incredible! What inspired you to create them?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Nate! They're visuals of the characters to help bring them alive in my head so I can write better.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: That's a cool way to gain insight into your characters. Where did you get your ideas for them?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: I got ideas from everywhere: people I know, stuff I saw, even what I imagined. It's cool to see how an idea takes shape into a person with their own wants, worries, and wishes.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Wow Joanna, that's so cool! It's amazing how our imaginations can bring ideas to life. Can you tell me more about the character on the left in the photo?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Nope! You'll just have to watch the movie and find out for yourself!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: You got it. I was already planning on watching it, but talking to you about it makes me want to watch it even more!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Awesome! Well enough about me, what have you been up to?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of two turtles sitting on a log in a pond
conversation_turns.text: I was bored today, so I just took my turtles out for a walk.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Sound fun! Did they have a good time?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of a dog laying on a rock in a zoo
conversation_turns.text: Of course! They look tired from all the walking, so they're relaxing in the tank right now.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a spoon full of ice cream and chocolate sauce
conversation_turns.text: Aww, they're so cute! What do they eat?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a container of lettuce and other greens
conversation_turns.text: They eat a combination of vegetables, fruits, and insects. They have a varied diet.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that's fascinating! It's interesting how they have such a varied diet, including insects. Do you have a favorite among their food choices?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of a group of strawberries and a turtle on a table
conversation_turns.text: I love seeing them eat fruit - they get so hyped and it's so cute!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that's so cute! They look like they really enjoy fruit.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a person holding a small turtle in their hand
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, it's adorable! Watching them enjoy their favorite snacks is so fun. I also like holding them.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a rock formation with a person standing on the side
conversation_turns.text: Do they have different personalities, like the way dogs and cats do?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, they each do. One is more adventurous while the other is more reserved, which I find cute. Having them around brings me joy and they make great companions.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: That's super cool! I never knew turtles could be so interesting until I met your turtles. Wow!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: I've always liked turtles since I was a boy, so I know all about them!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: You'll have to keep me posted on them! It's been fun chatting!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: See you later Joanna!

Joanna: A movie based on a second script that Joanna contributed to is released on the big screen
Nate: Nate takes his two turtles out for a walk.
Nate took his turtles out for a walk today and they are now relaxing in the tank.
Nate's turtles have a varied diet including vegetables, fruits, and insects.
Nate loves seeing his turtles eat fruit as they get excited and it's cute.
Nate's turtles have different personalities: one is more adventurous while the other is more reserved.
Nate has always liked turtles since he was a boy and finds them interesting.
Joanna: Joanna recently had a movie script she contributed to shown on the big screen for the first time.
Joanna feels a mix of emotions but overall satisfaction after seeing her script on the big screen.
Joanna's characters she wrote coming alive on screen was a cool and surreal experience for her.
Joanna creates visuals of her characters to help bring them alive in her head for better writing.
Joanna gets ideas for her characters from various sources like people she knows, things she sees, and her imagination.
Joanna's character visuals are used as a tool to visualize their wants, worries, and wishes.
Joanna finds it cool to see how an idea transforms into a person with unique traits.
